long_description:
= DESCRIPTION:

Windows admin recipes.

= ATTRIBUTES: 

See metadata.rb

= USAGE:

Designed to be run within a RightScale ServerTemplate

Boot Scripts
  * change_admin_password - Changes the administrator password
  * enable_sql_express_service - Enables the SQL Express service if disabled
